channel.title: Adobe on vNinja.net
channel.description: Recent content in Adobe on vNinja.net

item.title: It's Time to End the Add on Insanity
item.description: For the third time in a week, researchers have discovered a zero-day vulnerability in Adobe’s Flash Player browser plugin. Like the previous two discoveries, this one came to light only after hackers dumped online huge troves of documents stolen from Hacking Team — an Italian security firm that sells software exploits to governments around the world.
